message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this amazing product that I think you'll really appreciate. I'm open to offers, but I'm looking for at least $150 for it. What do you think?
Hi Alice, thank you for offering the product. I'm interested, but I can only pay up to $130 for it.
Bob, I appreciate your offer.  While $130 is closer to my minimum, I still need a bit more to make this work.  How about $140?  I think this product will be worth it for you.
Hello Alice, considering your last offer, I am willing to go up to $135 for the product. I hope this meets your needs.
